messages.subject: Re: Samurai Archives Citadel Forum
messages.msgSnippet: We re back online, hopefully for good: http://samurai.threespursdesign.com/ Unfortunately the database was only backed up on 6/2/06, so everything after that
messages.messageBody:
We're back online, hopefully for good:
http://samurai.threespursdesign.com/

Unfortunately the database was only backed up on 6/2/06, so
everything after that was lost, and if you had signed up after the
2nd, you may have to re-sign up. More details available directly on
the site.

Thanks!

--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Kitsuno" <samurai-
listowner@...> wrote:
>

the

> > > about "down time" at the forum.
> >
> > ...or perhaps not? ;-)
> >
> > -AngusH
>
>
> Yeah... I was told it was going to be taken down for final
> maintenance, apparently that was now, not the other night. Oh
well,
> I've been told that once the maintenance/replacements are done,
this
> won't be an issue again.
>

messages.subject: Re: Samurai Archives Citadel Forum
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yeah... I was told it was going to be taken down for final maintenance, apparently that was now, not the other night.  Oh well, I ve been told that once
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Haynes, A \(Angus\)"
<angus.haynes@...> wrote:
>
> > For anyone curious, some parts apparently need replacing on the
> > server, so tonight should be the last time we have to worry
> > about "down time" at the forum.
>
> ...or perhaps not? ;-)
>
> -AngusH


Yeah... I was told it was going to be taken down for final
maintenance, apparently that was now, not the other night. Oh well,
I've been told that once the maintenance/replacements are done, this
won't be an issue again.

server, so tonight should be the last time we have to worry
about "down time" at the forum.

messages.subject: Samurai Archives Citadel Forum
messages.msgSnippet: The Citadel forum seems to be down (for at least 7 hours now), not sure why, it seems that kryo s game is down too. So hopefully everything will get back
messages.messageBody:
The Citadel forum seems to be down (for at least 7 hours now), not
sure why, it seems that kryo's game is down too. So hopefully
everything will get back online soon. I'll let you know when it
happens. Or you can just keep trying the URL until it pops up.

:-)
